text:
Welcome to howtocookthat.net I am Ann Reardon
for a printable copy of the recipe simply

go to the website howtocookthat.net
Today we are looking at how to make cookie

monster cupcakes you are going to need some
cupcake, some mini choc chip cookies, some

brown m&m's and some white chocolate melts
or candy melts for the eyes.

And some blue buttercream just follow the
link below the video.

Then firstly what you need to do is put a
small amount of blue buttercream on each of

your white chocolate drops and then add a
brown m&m to that to make your eyes.

once you've finished doing that grab a skewer
and poke heaps of holes in one corner of your
ziplock bag of your buttercream.

Then grab one of your cupcakes and simply
squirt out your blue buttercream icing until

you've got a good coating of cookie monster
fur all over your cupcake.

Then take one of your eyes and place them
in place Then using a knife or the back of

a spoon make a mouth shape in a smiley shape
then obviously take one of your cookies and
put the cookie in cookie monsters mouth.

And now to check that they are good I am going
to give one to one of my little cookie monsters
to see how he likes it.

Thank you to everyone who has subscribed to
howtocookthat.net and clicked like and left

comments, I appreciate your support if you've
got any questions just leave it in the comments

section, or if you make these why not take
a photo head over to the blog and upload a

picture of what you've done so I can see your
creations [music by incompetech.com]
